title: World Series: Altuve, Bregman and Gurriel Set Tone for Astros
description: Jose Altuve, Yuli Gurriel and Alex Bregman have been the constants for an Astros team that never stops evolving. With one more win they can secure a second World Series title.
dc:creator: Scott Miller
media:description: Houston’s infield is led by a core of Jose Altuve, Alex Bregman and Yuli Gurriel. Younger stars, including Jeremy Peña follow their example.
